long_description: Insulated and water-resistant, the weather-wise Patagonia Low Sky parka for women will keep you warm under gray, drippy skies. A flattering fit means you'll look great, too. Polyester shell features a Durable Water Repellent finish that beads up light drizzle. Main body contains 200g of recycled-polyester insulation; sleeves contain 150g, for a slimmer look. Elegant quilting throughout blends linear and diamond shapes; contoured seams on front and back shape the fit. Tall, funnel-style collar provides extra warmth. Two-way front zipper eases sitting and walking. Patagonia Low Sky parka offers an internal zippered pocket and zippered handwarmer pockets on the front seams.
short_description: Insulated and water-resistant, the weather-wise Patagonia Low Sky parka for women will keep you warm under gray, drippy skies. A flattering fit means you'll look great, too.
